name: Death Knell Aura
source: Book of the Damned - Volume 3: Horsemen of the Apocalypse pg. 38
text: You gain a shimmering gray aura that feeds on the souls of creatures who die within it. The aura sheds light as a candle. If a creature at –1 or fewer hit points is within the aura at the start of its turn, it must save or die, granting you the benefits of death knell.
area_zh: 20尺半径弥漫, 以你为中心
text_zh: 妳获得了一道闪烁灰色微光的灵光，此灵魂会吞噬区域内死去生物的灵魂。此灵光散发的光芒如同蜡烛。如果有生物的生命值为-1或更低，并且在灵光区域内开始它的回合，他必须通过豁免，否则死亡，并且给予施法者死亡丧钟法术的好处。
